name: labelled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
label
having a label (= a piece of writing or material that gives you information) or labels attached telling you what something is or what its parts are: The patient was given medication from a wrongly labelled bottle. It is helpful to draw a labelled diagram to clarify your description. The package is clearly labelled as containing flammable items.
More examplesFewer examplesAdd labelled arrows to show the direction of movement.Keep medication in its original, labelled containers.Make sure all the connections for the equipment are clearly labelled.
